title: The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure
description:
When using a stored procedure, the schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename'. 

In the window 'Edit data set', if a stored procedure is dragged to the QueryText, the expected result is that the stored procedure name should be composed of the database schema name and the stored procedure name.
OB: In the 'Edit data set' window, when dragging a stored procedure to the QueryText
EB: The stored procedure naming should be composed of the database schema name and the stored procedure name
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the 'Edit data set' window
2. Drag a stored procedure to the QueryText
